title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.174 - Income statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 441.174 - Income statement

State Regulations

An accounting statement which reflects the financial
results of a hospital during an accounting period. The data for this statement
are accumulated in the revenue and expense accounts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
441.174

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
